long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Retro Bowl boasts user-friendly controls for an easy gridiron navigation and victorious team leadership. Here's a quick breakdown:

ğŸ•¹ï¸ Player Movement: Use the left-side virtual D-pad for precise control of your quarterback, running back, or wide receiver.

ğŸˆ Offensive Actions:

Passing: Tap the "Pass" button on the right to throw accurately to a chosen receiver.
Running: Hit the "Run" button on the right to maneuver your ball carrier, break tackles, and score touchdowns.
ğŸ›¡ï¸ Defensive Actions:

Tackling: On defense, tap "Tackle" to initiate a timely tackle against the offensive player.
ğŸ”„ Switch Players: Easily switch defenders by tapping the desired player icon above them, ensuring strategic defense.

ğŸ’¥ Special Moves and Power-ups: Keep an eye on the power-up gauge and trigger game-changing advantages at the right moment!

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
